attributes.action: Stop Super Trawlers from operating in UK territorial waters from the 01/01/2021.
attributes.additional_details: Super Trawlers significantly reduce the quota distribution available to a combined fishing fleet. Environmentally super trawlers destroy the habitats inclusive of fish migration. Super trawler also reduce the potential for individual business enterprise.
attributes.background: Cease all foreign and domestic Super Trawlers from operating in UK territorial waters permanently.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300164
